snippet.displayMessage: This is a test message. How does it look?

items.title: Item 1
items.body: Please give feedback via the link in the description. 4   2 questions, no personal data collected.

items.title: Item
items.body: Don't forget to subscribe to Anders' YouTube channel!

items.title: Item
items.body: Connect with me on LinkedIn, I will try to answer any questions and share my response with the participants.

snippet.displayMessage: Feel free to ask questions in this live chat. Although I will have all my hands full I will try to answer at least some of them live. And the others I will follow up with!

textMessageDetails.messageText: Feel free to ask questions in this live chat. Although I will have all my hands full I will try to answer at least some of them live. And the others I will follow up with!
Feel free to ask questions in this live chat. Although I will have all my hands full I will try to answer at least some of them live. And the others I will follow up with!

items.title: Item 1
items.body: Welcome to the live event, welcome to my home (office)! ;) Let's have an informative hour!

items.title: Item
items.body: The description already has a link to my webpage, it will be updated after the event with most of the material used.

items.title: Item
items.body: Body textMost likely the event will be busy for me as a solo producer, host and technician -- but am happy to get your questions in the comments. Either during or after the event they will be addressed.
